ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( Agent_Split_Commision_Type__c ))), ISBLANK( Agent_Split_Commission1__c ) )
|| AND( ISBLANK(TEXT(Agent_Split_Commision_Type__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Agent_Split_Commission1__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Agent Split Commission Type & Agent Split Commission is required
